channel.title: Death emote when killed
channel.description:
Currently, my server only teleports the person to home when they die, it doesn't do the emote when the user falls and then teleports.
How do I add this and where do I add this, HybridPVP base.

item.title: Death emote when killed
item.dc:creator: @Trebel Trebel
item.description:
@Trebel wrote:

if(respawnTimer == 7) {
respawnTimer = -6;
getPA().giveLife();
} else if(respawnTimer == 12) {
respawnTimer–;
startAnimation(0x900);
poisonDamage = -1;
}

Change the 0x900.

Read full topic
